channel.title: Hi I need help, I'm a begginer coder
channel.description: When someone trades, you cant cllick the 'username wants to trade with you' - I have to right click and send them a trade also. I also want to rename the 'pkp' to my pkp name I have for the server.. also how do I change the price for PKP.. on Items.. Also I have this as a tele - where it comes up in the chat box and has numerous options where to tele, how do I remove one of them? - Thanks would mean alot.
